Text: I want to thank you so much for bringing up good memories. Keep them coming, and most of all, keep them seeding! Thanks :)

Unless this version is different to the CD version, it won't work on Windows 7 x64.

The only version that will is the Good Old Games one.

Nice game, and thanks for the upload, though.
Great game from cauldron, probably the longest fps ever.

I still cant get this little snark working on XP.

Sure would like to play it. Looks a bit like Devastation.
I fucking love this game for some reason. I keep coming back to it almost every year, even though it's no masterpiece.
dont wanna come off as ungrateful, but i think we all could have done well without alll the silly irrelevant image files.
